name: A chaotic Symphony
description:
Full Screen recommended for a better experience

A 3D Platformer in which you can be caught by surprise anytime by the various platforms that change your Speed, Jump, Gravity and also invert your controls.

Controls:

Forward: W, Backward: S, Left: A, Right: D

Jump: Space, Sprint: Left Shift (Hold)

Return To Last Checkpoint: Backspace

Effects of various blocks:

 Orange: Randomly changes the Speed of the player (Don't overshoot the jump now)

 Black: Randomly decreases the gravity and resets after some time 

Green: Randomly increases the Jump of the player. It can be anything from little change to maybe you can complete the whole level with this.

Yellow: It inverts your controls. I can't see what could go wrong...

Big Platform: Checkpoint. Because you will need it

When the timer stops, you have completed the protoype!

Let there be Chaos!

Maybe...

-Credits:

Skybox taken from Asset Store: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/fantasy-skybox-f...
